title: pixel 4 -can't store new face data. delete an old one first - after fresh install of December image
content:
Hey,

I tried to reimage the phone again. yet no success, I keep getting this message of "delete old one first" but no face is set in the device.
I didn't find any relation of the face recognition in the google setting on the device nor in the web.

with no finger sensor, it is totally frustrating.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
